attributes.action: Reduce international students fees during this pandemic in the uk
attributes.additional_details: They should look into it not using the resources at school. We hike with our own internet and have to be charged £14000 and above it’s fair if they refund a certain percentage
attributes.background: They should reduce the fees it’s very unfair working 20 hours and there’s no job this season and then we have to pay those amount of fees and housing cost they should refund a certain percentage

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions calling for similar actions:

Tuition Fee Compensation for International Students in UK Universities: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572202

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911
